content: in this legal case the pärnu county court ruled that the defendant is responsible for paying procedural costs the court issued a final resolution and a default decision was made on behalf of the republic of estonia the bail was paid by a person named kaja the court informed the parties of changes in the court composition and set deadlines for submitting final claims the claimant has requested the division of joint property and correction of the land register the defendant has not cooperated and acted in bad faith the court has set deadlines for the parties to respond and will review all evidence and arguments before issuing a final decision the text also mentions the transfer of funds between parties through swedbank but does not provide specific details the text refers to various code articles to support its explanations in another case one party has been ordered to pay compensation to another party within a specified timeframe the court has delivered the claim materials to the defendant and the defendant is expected to respond within a specified timeframe the court has also published a statement about the case in a public publication the defendant has submitted a written response but the court has deemed the plaintiffs allegations to be accepted the court has rendered a default judgment which is immediately enforceable the judgment was signed digitally by the judge
